name: Infinite Gauntlet
description:
As the new minister of games, you have been tasked with the almost impossible task of setting up an Arena fight that lasts an eternity, literally.

Arrange up to 4(!) different types of fighters to make sure they are really trying to kill each other, but not completely.

Controls:

Use your mouse to position fighters and add new ones to the mix.

For LudumDare 47.
